text: Kawakawa is a small town in the Far North District and in the Bay of Islands. It once had coal mining until the early 20th century and focuses its economy on farming. It has a primary school, a high school and hospital situated in the town. It has State Highway 1 and State Highway 11 intersecting in the town. ==References== Category:Towns in Northland Region Category:Far North District Category:Bay of Islands
title: Kawakawa, New Zealand
